original_text: But after the disciples had gathered around him, he got up and went back into the city. The next day he and Barnabas left for Derbe.
korean_text: 제자들이 둘러섰을 때에 바울이 일어나 그 성에 들어갔다가 이튿날 바나바와 함께 더베로 가서

sentences.original_text: But after the disciples had gathered around him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 제자들이 그의 주위로 모인 후에

sentences.original_text: and went back into the city
he and Barnabas left for Derbe
